Mass. House unveils plan to rein in health care costs

Mass. House leaders predicted they could produce $160 billion in savings by requiring cuts to the rate of spending by medical professionals. (Globe)

Beastie Boys cofounder Adam Yauch dies at 47

Adam Yauch, the gravelly voiced Beastie Boys rapper of the seminal hip-hop group, has died after battling cancer for three years. (AP)
  • Pictures Yauch's career  |  Celebs react  |  R.I.P Yauch

DA: Burlington suspect killed mother of 2

Christopher Piantedosi, wanted for the murder of his girlfriend, is in custody after he was found sitting in a State Police barracks parking lot. (Globe)
  • Video Big Story: Burlington murder suspect in custody

These flicks will have you falling out of your seats with laughter. Check out our list and vote for your favorites.

No sign of missing toddler at
Rockport beach, state police say

State Police returned to Long Beach this afternoon to search for Caleigh Anne Harrison, but found no sign of the toddler who disappeared last month. (Globe)

Police warn of scam after woman reports being hypnotized, handing over $160,000

A woman has told Boston police she was hypnotized by scam artists and tricked into giving them all her valuables, including $160,000 in cash. (Globe)
